dc_title_s: Dawson's map of the Dominion of Canada 1881
dc_description_s: Shows railroads existing and under construction, canals, counties, and civil townships.; Covers eastern Canada and part of northeastern United States.; Includes inset maps: Continuation of map to the Pacific, showing British Columbia & Manitoba -- Manitoba & connecting territory -- Environs of Montreal -- Newfoundland.; In lower right: "J. Bartholomew, Edinburgh."|55 x 83 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:2,400,000|General Map Collection
